com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators

Class TextReplaceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators.TextReplaceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotator<Sentence>, SentenceAnnotator

    public class TextReplaceFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SentenceAnnotator
    Applies a list of TextReplacer to an annotated text, where each replacer is applied to the result of the previous replacer. For any replaced text, will add an Annotation containing a TextReplacement.

    To instantiate, create a list of tabs, each of which contains the name of a registered TextReplacer. For example:
     TextReplaceFilter  QuoteNormaliser LowercaseKnownFirstWordFilter UppercaseSeriesFilter
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
